thread.section_title: Ebookmall Beoordelingen | Beoordelingen van Ebookmall | www.ebookmall.com
thread.title: Dasha Ali

author: Dasha Ali
title: Dasha Ali
text:
I needed these books immediately. It makes no sense why my purchases were blocked. I paid for them and it says it is blocked. I have emailed then and now I have to wait to unlock these purchases. I'm trying to get ahead in my class and this block is preventing me from doing so.
Update**
They did respond very quickly. The blocking in the begging was very irritating but everything works now! Thank you
